comments.body: The object needs to extend ng.IScope
Interesting.  I guess I made a poor assumption here

You can pass in the string value of scope.

For example:

```
$scope.searchResults = []

 $scope.gridOptions = {
data: 'searchResults'
}
```
Ahh.  I wasn't familiar with that.  Is it documented?
This should be uiGridConstants.ASC or uiGridConstants.DESC which are both numbers

@btesser  -- UiGridConstants.ASC returns a string as far as i can tell:

https://github.com/angular-ui/ui-grid/blob/master/src/js/core/constants.js#L65
Wow I guess I overlooked that... my bad

I was able to find `useExternalFiltering` in the ui-grid API documentation (http://ui-grid.info/docs/#/api/ui.grid.class:GridOptions), but I couldn't find `enableGridMenu` documented anywhere.  I assume it does exist as I found it referred to in the source (https://github.com/angular-ui/ui-grid/blob/e8e5653/src/features/exporter/js/exporter.js#L1221), but just curious how you came about the documentation for that option.  Is this a case where it would be good to update and improve the ui-grid documentation as well?

@joeskeen The enableGridMenu option is part of their tutorial 

http://ui-grid.info/docs/#/tutorial/121_grid_menu
@joeskeen Thanks for the review! I'll update the API docs and will submit a PR soon.

I tested this, and it does seem to work at runtime, but I can't find any reference to this in the documentation (http://ui-grid.info/docs/#/api/ui.grid.class:Grid).  Perhaps this would be a good opportunity to improve the docs?
@joeskeen It is part of their tutorial (http://ui-grid.info/docs/#/tutorial/308_external_filtering) but I agree that the API documentation can be improved. I'll be submitting a pull request soon.

Fair enough!  @vvakame , ready to merge! :+1: 

@ashwin027 thanks for your contribution!
